forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
